abstract: Merrill Lynch, which is set to merge with Bank of America, plans to cut year-end bonuses in half, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people with knowledge of the situation.
lead_paragraph: Merrill Lynch, which is set to merge with Bank of America, plans to cut year-end bonuses in half, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people with knowledge of the situation.

headline.main: Merrill Plans to Halve Bonuses, Report Says
